tasks.check: deno task codegen && deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check */*.ts
tasks.codegen: deno run --allow-read --allow-write --check codegen/main.ts vocab/ ../runtime/ > vocab/mod.ts && deno fmt vocab/mod.ts && deno cache vocab/mod.ts && deno check vocab/mod.ts
tasks.test: deno task codegen && deno task test-without-codegen
